duplicateLogin.title: Duplicate Login Detected
duplicateLogin.guide: Selecting 'Login' will terminate the session on the other device.

dormantAccount.title: Dormant Account Notice
dormantAccount.defaultMessage:
Your account has been switched to a dormant state due to prolonged inactivity.
You can use the service normally immediately after identity verification.

recaptcha.title: Security Verification
recaptcha.description1: For account security, reCAPTCHA verification is required.
recaptcha.description2: To ensure a secure login, please prove you are not a robot.
recaptcha.expiredMessage: Security verification has expired. Please try again.
recaptcha.errorMessage: An error occurred during security verification.
recaptcha.loadFailedMessage: Could not load the security verification module.

messages.validationError: Please check your information and agree to the required terms.
messages.idInUse: This ID is already in use.
messages.unsafePassword: This password is not secure. Please use a different one.
messages.agreeToRequiredTerms: Please agree to all required terms of service.

rules.pwnedPassword:
This password has been exposed in a data breach.
Please use a different password.

passwordComplexity.title: Password Complexity
passwordComplexity.rule2: Include letters, numbers, and special characters
passwordComplexity.rule3: Cannot be the same as your ID
passwordComplexity.rule4: Cannot include your birth date or phone number
passwordComplexity.rule6: Include both uppercase and lowercase letters

dialogs.confirmSignUpMessage: Would you like to complete your sign-up with the information you provided?
dialogs.privacyTitle: Consent to Collection and Use of Personal Information
dialogs.privacySectionTitle: Details of Personal Information Collection and Use
dialogs.retentionInfo: Information will be destroyed immediately upon account withdrawal. However, if storage is required by relevant laws, it will be preserved for the specified period.
dialogs.refusalTitle: Right to Refuse Consent and Disadvantages
dialogs.refusalContentPrivacy: You have the right to refuse consent to the collection and use of personal information. However, if you refuse consent for required items, your sign-up and use of related services may be restricted.
dialogs.agreeRequired: (Required) I agree to the collection and use of personal information.
dialogs.agreeMarketing: (Optional) I agree to receive marketing information (Email, SMS).
dialogs.thirdPartyTitle: Consent to Overseas Transfer and Processing of Personal Information
dialogs.thirdPartySectionTitle: Details of Overseas Transfer and Processing
dialogs.transferPurpose: Operation of cloud database servers and secure storage/management of data
dialogs.transferItems: All personal information collected at sign-up (ID, password, email, etc.)
dialogs.transferRetention: Until account withdrawal or termination of the consignment contract
dialogs.refusalContentThirdParty: You have the right to refuse consent to the overseas transfer and processing of your personal information. However, refusal will prevent core service functions from operating, making sign-up and all service use impossible.
dialogs.agreeThirdParty: (Required) I have confirmed all the above and consent to the overseas transfer and processing of my personal information.
dialogs.etcSection1Content: Describe the first major policy or other notices in detail here. It can be composed of multiple paragraphs. It is advisable to convey important information that the user must know clearly and concisely.
dialogs.etcSection2Content: Write the second notice here. For example, it could include service usage rules, content copyright policies, or dispute resolution procedures.
dialogs.etcListItem1: Item 1: Specify related detailed rules or guidelines.
dialogs.etcListItem2: Item 2: Another important matter that the user must comply with.
dialogs.agreeEtc: (Required) I have confirmed all other terms above and agree to them.

findId.title: Find ID
findId.description: You can find your ID with the information you registered with.
findId.placeholderName: Enter the name you registered with.
findId.placeholderEmail: Enter the email you registered with.
findId.resultDescription: Here is the result of your ID inquiry.
findId.phoneServiceNoticeDesc: The phone number lookup feature is currently unavailable.

messages.copyFailed: Failed to copy. Please try again.

emailHelp.title: Didn't receive an email?
emailHelp.description:
Delivery may be delayed up to 5 minutes depending on the mail server.
If you don't receive it after 5 minutes, please check the following:
emailHelp.checkGmailTabs: For [Gmail], it might be classified under the 'Promotions' or 'Social' tab.
emailHelp.checkEmailAddress:
Your entered email address: {email}
Please verify that the email address is correct.
emailHelp.checkSenderAddress:
Sender address: koobs970729@gmail.com
Adding this to your contacts can help ensure you receive our emails.

findPassword.title: Find Password
findPassword.description: Please select a method to find your password.

step1.emailDescription: Please verify your identity with your registered information.
step1.securityDescription: Please answer the security question you set up.
step1.placeholderName: Enter the name you registered with.
step1.placeholderEmail: Enter the email you registered with.
step1.placeholderAuthCode: Enter the code received via email.
step1.placeholderAnswer: Enter the answer to the security question.
step1.alertNoQuestionDesc: There is no security question for this ID.

step2.title: Reset Password
step2.placeholderConfirmPassword: Please enter your new password again.

step3.title: Password Changed Successfully
step3.description:
Your password has been changed successfully.
Please log in again.

withdrawConfirm.title: Account Withdrawal Guide
withdrawConfirm.subtitle: Are you sure you want to withdraw your account?

warning.message: Upon withdrawal, the following information will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
warning.item1: - Account information and all personal data
warning.item2: - All activity records such as posts and comments

finalConfirm.line2: please enter '{actionText}' exactly in the field below.

finalConfirmDialog.title: Final Confirmation
finalConfirmDialog.line1: Your account information will be permanently deleted.
finalConfirmDialog.line2: Are you absolutely sure you want to proceed?

closed.title: Closed Today
closed.message: This place is closed for the day.

after_closing.title: Already Closed
after_closing.message: They have already closed for the day.

unknown.title: Cannot Confirm Status
unknown.message: Could not confirm their operating status.

veryCrowded.message: A very long wait is expected. Consider other options.

crowded.message: There's a high chance of waiting. Plan accordingly.

moderate.message: There might be a short wait.

calm.message: It's relatively calm. A good time to visit.

quiet.message: It's very quiet! You can get in without any wait.

errors.ER_000: An internal server error has occurred.
errors.ER_104: A duplicate login has been detected. You will be forcibly logged out.
errors.ER_105: You do not have permission to access this resource.
errors.ER_106: The account has been locked due to excessive login attempts.
errors.ER_107: This password cannot be used as it has been previously compromised.
errors.ER_108: Dormant user information could not be found.
errors.ER_009: The request is already being processed. Please try again later.
errors.ER_010: The input value is not valid.
errors.F001: This file extension is not allowed.
errors.ER_109: Your account has been locked due to exceeding the maximum login attempts (5 times). Please try again in 5 minutes.
errors.ER_110: This password cannot be used as it has been previously compromised. Please use a different password.
errors.ER_111: For account security, reCAPTCHA verification is required.
errors.ER_113:
You are already logged in on another device.
Would you like to force disconnection and log in here?
errors.ER_114: You do not have access rights.
errors.ER_115:
Your account has been converted to a dormant state due to a long period of inactivity.
You can reactivate your account through identity verification.
errors.ER_116:
A login from a different environment has been detected.
For account protection, please proceed with identity verification.
errors.ER_119: No user matches the information you entered.
errors.ER_122: The verification code is invalid or has expired.
errors.ER_124: The token is invalid or has expired.
